name: Save Eurydice
description:
Save Eurydice is a tactical two-player game where you try to help Eurydice get out of the Underworld as the Heroes, or try to stop her as the Monsters of Hades!

It includes a tutorial to learn the game, that you can play directly in your browser. Then, you will have to play with one of your friends on the same network, using the executable file.

Made in Godot by David Dehaene.
